name: venice-dev-tools
description: unOfficial SDK for the Venice AI API

scripts.build: PNPM_CONFIG_AUTO_INSTALL_PEERS=true pnpm install && cd packages/core && pnpm install && pnpm run build && cd ../node && pnpm install && pnpm run build && cd ../web && pnpm install && pnpm run build && cd ../../

author: Venice AI
